overview: It's that time of the year again and we've got exactly what you need! Seven ball crunching scenes, one smooth-to-the-groove girl, and a partridge in a pear tree. It's Amy Ried in this special collector's edition that will make you splooge it 'til you lose it. She gets her butter churned and her pussy turned as she gets hit with a 3rd degree burn. And with over 2 hours 30 minutes of chicken chop suey until your balls turn bluey, it's no wonder why everybody loves that girl named Amy!
title: I Love Amy
